title: Behaving Badly Official Trailer #1 (2014) - Selena Gomez, Nat Wolff Movie HD
description: Subscribe to TRAILERS: http://bit.ly/sxaw6h Subscribe to COMING SOON: http://bit.ly/H2vZUn Like us on FACEBOOK: http://goo.gl/dHs73 Follow us on TWITTER: http://bit.ly/1ghOWmt Behaving Badly Official Trailer #1 (2014) - Selena Gomez, Nat Wolff Movie HD AVAILABLE IN THEATERS: August 1, 2014 NOW AVAILABLE ON VOD AND iTUNES CAST: Nat Wolff, Selena Gomez, Mary-Louise Parker, Elisabeth Shue, Dylan McDermott, Heather Graham, Ashley Rickards, Cary Elwes, Patrick Warburton, Jason Lee WRITERS: Tim Garrick, Scott Russell DIRECTOR: Tim Garrick SYNOPSIS: In this fast-paced, outrageously funny, all-star romp, socially awkward high schooler Rick Stevens (Nat Wolff) is willing to do whatever it takes to win the heart of the girl of his dreams ... and he does mean anything. But love's a bitch! Particularly when your sights are set on the most beautiful and popular girl at school (teen queen and pop superstar Selena Gomez). GENRE: Comedy RATING: R for crude sexual content and language throughout, some graphic nudity and drug material.
